Title: Formwork has a cross-site scripting (XSS) vulnerability in Site title
Description: The site title field at /panel/options/site/allows embedding JS tags, which can be used to attack all members of the system. This is a widespread attack and can cause significant damage if there is a considerable number of users.
AffectedVersions: All versions starting from 2.0.0-beta.3 before 2.0.0-beta.4, version 2.0.0-beta.3
